Capkova1,2, P. Capkova1,2, J. Srovnal1,3, K. Staffova1,3, ClinVar). We described two unrelated patients with ASD, K. Adamova1,2, J. Pazderova1, M. Hajduch3, ID and facial dysmorphia who carried the duplication of M. Prochazka1,2 2q37 including DIS3L2. We suggest that this CNV might cause of abnormal phenotype with variable penetrance.
